data.question: If a pure tall pea plant (TT) is crossed with a pure dwarf pea plant (tt), the ratio of tall to dwarf plants in the F1 generation will be:

data.op_1: Forelimb of frog and forelimb of lizard
data.op_2: Wings of butterfly and wings of bat
data.op_3: Flippers of penguin and flippers of dolphin
data.ans: Wings of butterfly and wings of bat
